General.Name: Everyman Media Group plc
General.Description: Everyman Media Group plc, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the ownership and management of cinemas in the United Kingdom. The company operates a network of 38 venues with 130 screens under the Everyman brand name. It is also involved in the property management business. The company was formerly known as Finlaw Two Plc and changed its name to Everyman Media Group plc in October 2013. Everyman Media Group plc was founded in 1933 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.

3.Name: Mr. William John Henry Worsdell A.C.A.
3.Title: Exec. Director & Fin. Director
